name: 'Small Wonder' Online Quiz | Small Wonder | 10 Questions

questions.text: What is the name and proper spelling for the title character?
questions.explanation:
VICI.

	As a child, her name was Victoria "Vicki" Ann Smith-Lawson. The name came from her robot name VICI which stood for "Voice Input Child Identicant." Tiffany Brissette played Vicki.

questions.text: What is the name of the son?
questions.explanation:
Jamie.

	Jamie was Vicki's brother, even though Vicki was a robot. She became part of the family. Jerry Suprian played Jamie. Jamie was ten years old at the start of the series.

questions.text: What was the name of the precocious little girl next door?
questions.explanation:
Harriet.

	Emily Schulman played Harriet. Harriet is very nosy and has a crush on Jamie. Jamie is always mean to her. Harriet learned to be nosy from her mother, Bonnie (played by Edie McClurg).

questions.text: Who played the father next door?
questions.explanation:
William Bogert.

	William Bogert was born in 1938 in New York City, NY, USA. He died in 2020, but no cause was given. His character on "Small Wonder" was Brandon Brindle. Brandon was Ted (Jamie's father) Lawson's boss. He worked with Ted and got promoted to his boss after stealing some ideas from Ted. The Brindles also live next door to the Lawsons. The Lawsons do not like the Brindles but try to be nice.

questions.text: What is the name of Jamie's best friend?
questions.explanation:
Reggie Williams.

	Paul C. Scott played Reggie Wilson. While Reggie was Jamie's best friend, he was often his rival. In one episode, Jamie asked Harriet to bring him an out-of-season pineapple, and when she returned with one, Reggie reminded Jamie that he promised to marry Harriet if she found a pineapple.

questions.text: One child in the cast of "Small Wonder" won two awards. Which child actress was it?
questions.explanation:
Emily Schulman.

	Emily Schulman won the Young Artist Award for Best Young Supporting Actress in a New Series in 1986. In 1987, she won the award again, but for Exceptional Performance by a Young Actress in a Long-Running Series, Comedy or Drama.

questions.text: What was the name of the company that Ted Lawson worked at?
questions.explanation:
United Robotronics.

	Ted is a robotics engineer. He was the one who created VICI, and when he's not working, he is the father of her as Vickie. Ted's favorite pastime is playing golf.

questions.text: Where does Vicki "sleep" when everyone goes to bed at night?
options: A cabinet in Ted and Joan's room
questions.explanation:
Cabinet in Jamie's room.

	In the very first episode, Jamie had to get dressed, so he asked Vicki to turn her head. Vicki is very literal and turned her head all the way around backward. Harriet saw this and was a little freaked out. Harriet came over the next morning and asked who the girl was, and Jamie told her Vicki was her cousin. Then he shut the door in Harriet's face.

questions.text: Who was the robot that looked like Vicki but was a little more advanced?
questions.explanation:
Vanessa.

	Tiffany Brissette also played Vanessa. When speaking, she was not as monotone as Vicki and appeared in the last two seasons. Vanessa was not as well behaved as Vicki since she was built to be more like other girls. She could be quite evil, but thankfully like Vicki, she had an emergency shut-off button on the top of her head.

questions.text: Did Vicki ever go to school?
questions.explanation:
Yes.

	Vicki goes to school with Jamie, and amazingly only the people the family wishes to know that Vicki's a robot know. Sometimes Jamie has to think fast, like when Vicki stretches her neck up to see something.
